metadata.title: Instant Oats Semolina Idli & Coconut Chutney- Instant Pot Idlis- Easy & Healthy Indian Recipes
metadata.description: Instant oats & semolina idlis cooked in the Instant Pot, these are healthy idlis- no fermentation required. Also, sharing the recipe for making my favorite roasted coconut & tomato chutney. Idlis along with chutney will taste delicious & is comforting- perfect South Indian breakfast combo.
